Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2003...
Injured on 5/1/2006 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/5/2006 with a Broken Ribs, out for 10 weeks...

Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2010, off Chris Britton (TB)...
